header.rec_loc: Dining room at home, Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: ANON and ANON telling Grannie (ANON) and ANON about their camping trip, ANON and ANON telling us about their visit to Gothenburg incl transport, airline flights, and giving presents including sweets, weather, Oscar working at the shop, homework, stillettos, ANON going to a party, camping, cleaner, builders, slippers, jumper, relatives in Ireland, windfarms, energy, family (ANON and ANON), presents, watches.
header.activity: Catching up with granny and mike

speaker.fls: French -- limited; Spanish -- limited; Swahili -- limited
